changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO CUSTOMERS (CUSTOMERID,NICKNAME,FIRSTNAME,LASTNAME,BIRTHDATE,EMAIL,COUNTRYCODE,CITY,REGDATE,CREDENTIALID) VALUES( '1', 'heisenberg', 'Walter', 'White', TO_DATE('1967-02-19', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'walter.whie@gmail.com', 'HU', 'Miskolc', TO_TIMESTAMP('2016-03-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), '1');
